data.name: Pizza Shop Manager
data.detailed_description:
Pizza Shop Manager is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to fulfil pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun cooking game. You take the role of Pizzeria Manager. Manage every aspect of your pizzeria and make it become the best eatery in town!!

  • Complete control over YOUR menu! Design your very own pizzas: assign them a name, top them as you like and set their price.
  • More than 35 ingredients to unlock and choose from.
  • A detailed management mode to neatly organise your small culinary empire. Purchase new tables, adjust the business hours, add new furniture to your restaurant, advertise it, propose scrumptious offers to your customers!
  • Tight competition in order to become the best restaurant in town.
  • Buy restaurant furniture and equipment
  • Hire waiters, cooks and a manager, each with their own skills
  • Decide every detail of your cafe and do whatever it takes to make your customers happy!
data.about_the_game:
Pizza Shop Manager is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to fulfil pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun cooking game. You take the role of Pizzeria Manager. Manage every aspect of your pizzeria and make it become the best eatery in town!!

  • Complete control over YOUR menu! Design your very own pizzas: assign them a name, top them as you like and set their price.
  • More than 35 ingredients to unlock and choose from.
  • A detailed management mode to neatly organise your small culinary empire. Purchase new tables, adjust the business hours, add new furniture to your restaurant, advertise it, propose scrumptious offers to your customers!
  • Tight competition in order to become the best restaurant in town.
  • Buy restaurant furniture and equipment

  • Decide every detail of your cafe and do whatever it takes to make your customers happy!
data.short_description: Pizza Shop Manager gives you an opportunity to open and manage a pizza restaurant of your dreams. It's all in your hands. Toss it, flip it, make it. Create your pizza empire!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 512 RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz quad core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 1024 RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
